critical_issues.title: Medication-Allergy Conflict
critical_issues.message: Patient has a 'Liver complaint' allergy, and Dolo-Crosine (Acetaminophen Extended) is prescribed. Acetaminophen is known to be hepatotoxic and should be used with extreme caution or avoided in patients with liver issues.
critical_issues.suggested_action: Review Dolo-Crosine prescription with prescribing physician. Consider alternative pain management or a lower, safer dose with close liver function monitoring, or discontinuation if appropriate.
